translations: v.检查，调查；考核，测验；（医生）诊察；（尤指在法庭上）审问，查问

sentences.sentence: It is necessary to examine how the proposals can be carried out.
sentences.translation: 有必要调查一下怎样才能实施这些方案。

sentences.sentence: We examine the wording in detail before deciding on the final text.
sentences.translation: 我们详细检查了措辞，才确定了最终文本。

sentences.sentence: The committee will examine the agreement and any problems arising therefrom.
sentences.translation: 委员会将审查这项协议和由此引起的问题。
